abstract: Dustin Brown beats Sam Querrey to advance to quarterfinals of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dustin Brown beat sixth-seeded Sam Querrey, 6-2, 4-6, 6-4, to advance to the quarterfinals of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.

headline.main: Dustin Brown Eliminates Sam Querrey at Hall of Fame Championships
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Brown Eliminates Querrey

snippet: Dustin Brown beat sixth-seeded Sam Querrey, 6-2, 4-6, 6-4, to advance to the quarterfinals of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.
